data.title: Which Bingo, if any ?
data.statement:
<<Background:>>
In Bingo...
The winner is the first person to cover five spaces in a row — vertical, horizontal or diagonal — in basic Bingo. Shout “BINGO” when you get five marks in a row. **


<<Your Task:>>
Here is a Bingo Card, and all the [[ballsDrawn]] from the tumbler to this point.
Determine if this Card has a Bingo. 
If so, in which direction: horizontal, vertical, or diagonal.
(The exact phrasing for the 4 acceptable outputs is shown in the Output section.)


<<For simplicity:>>
‣ Balls do not contain a letter
‣ There is no "free" spot in the middle of the Bingo-Card



** Source: https://letsgobingo.org/how-to-play/
data.constraints: There will never be a double-bingo (or triple-bingo); for example, a Bingo achieved vertically and diagonally at the same time.
data.stubGenerator:
read BingoHeader:string(20)
loop 5 read rowOfBingoCard:string(20)
read ballsDrawn:string(300)
write No Bingo yet ~or~ Horizontal Bingo ~or~ Vertical Bingo ~or~ Diagonal Bingo
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> A string, the "B I N G O" header (not needed; just shown for aesthetics/accuracy)
<<Next 5 Lines:>> Strings, the 5 lines of a Bingo Card
<<Next Line:>> A string, the [[ballsDrawn]]
data.outputDescription: {{No Bingo yet}} or {{Horizontal Bingo}} or {{Vertical Bingo}} or {{Diagonal Bingo}}

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Background:
In Bingo...
The winner is the first person to cover five spaces in a row — vertical, horizontal or diagonal — in basic Bingo. Shout “BINGO” when you get five marks in a row. **


Your Task:
Here is a Bingo Card, and all the ballsDrawn from the tumbler to this point.
Determine if this Card has a Bingo.
If so, in which direction: horizontal, vertical, or diagonal.
(The exact phrasing for the 4 acceptable outputs is shown in the Output section.)


For simplicity:
‣ Balls do not contain a letter
‣ There is no "free" spot in the middle of the Bingo-Card



** Source: https://letsgobingo.org/how-to-play/
Input
Line 1: A string, the "B I N G O" header (not needed; just shown for aesthetics/accuracy)
Next 5 Lines: Strings, the 5 lines of a Bingo Card
Next Line: A string, the ballsDrawn
Output
No Bingo yet or Horizontal Bingo or Vertical Bingo or Diagonal Bingo
Constraints
There will never be a double-bingo (or triple-bingo); for example, a Bingo achieved vertically and diagonally at the same time.
Example
Input
 B  I  N  G  O
12 22 32 46 65
 8 16 37 53 66
 1 25 42 58 71
 5 27 34 55 69
 7 29 39 47 64
32 22 46 16 65 66 9 12
Output
Horizontal Bingo
